solutionFilter.filterBy:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the button that opens the solution filter options.
**UI Location**: Solution List Page → Filter button
**When Users See This**: Always visible next to the filter icon on the solution list page.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Filter by"
solutionFilter.applyFilters:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to confirm and apply the selected filter options.
**UI Location**: Solution List Page → Filter dialog → Footer
**When Users See This**: After opening the filter dialog and making selections, before closing.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Apply filters"
solutionFilter.close:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to close the filter options dialog without applying changes.
**UI Location**: Solution List Page → Filter dialog → Footer
**When Users See This**: When the filter dialog is open.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Close"
